name: Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V.
description: Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V. is a leading poultry producer and food manufacturer in Mexico, renowned for its commitment to quality, sustainability, and innovation in the food sector. Founded in 1952, the company specializes in the production, distribution, and marketing of chicken and egg products, serving both domestic and international markets. Bachoco operates multiple facilities across Mexico, utilizing advanced technology and best practices in animal husbandry to ensure high-quality products while maintaining a focus on animal welfare and environmental responsibility. The company is dedicated to providing nutritious and affordable food options, contributing significantly to food security in the regions it serves. With a diverse product portfolio that includes fresh chicken, processed chicken, and egg products, Bachoco has established itself as a household name and a trusted brand. The company also engages in various initiatives aimed at sustainability, including energy efficiency, waste reduction, and responsible sourcing. As a publicly traded company on the Mexican Stock Exchange and the over-the-counter market in the United States, Bachoco continues to expand its operations and market presence, driven by a mission to deliver quality food products while fostering community development and environmental stewardship.

seo.meta_title: Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V. | Leading Poultry Producer in Mexico
seo.meta_description: Explore Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V., a top poultry producer committed to quality and sustainability. Learn about their products, history, and impact on food security.

faq.question: What does Bachoco produce?
faq.answer: Bachoco primarily produces chicken and egg products, including whole chickens, chicken cuts, and fresh eggs.

faq.question: Where is Bachoco headquartered?
faq.answer: Bachoco is headquartered in Celaya, Guanajuato, Mexico.

faq.question: Is Bachoco publicly traded?
faq.answer: Yes, Bachoco is publicly traded on the Mexican Stock Exchange and the over-the-counter market in the United States.
